summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding the service of a trial subpoena to Xavier College Preparatory to obtain school records. The document is part of the Epstein case evidence collection.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting service of a subpoena to Xavier College Preparatory for school records as part of the Epstein case investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to Xavier College Preparatory
events.description: A trial subpoena is issued to Xavier College Preparatory school to obtain school records, likely related to a victim or person of interest in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A trial subpoena was issued to Xavier College Preparatory school on July 30, 2021, to obtain school records.
The subpoena was handled by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing evidence collection in the Epstein case as of July 2021.
The prosecutor anticipated potential confidentiality issues from the school regarding student records.
The email correspondence shows coordination between legal teams to serve the subpoena.
